::Bat-Probe::


But it wasn't a common bat, its organic and mettallic
body was hihgh as hawk. its red eyes blinked and
started to shot bat's lasers against the bots while it
was flying around (obvously it was mad cause, because
someone confused confuse it with a fly).

::Najah ::

Najah arrived where his faction was. As soon as he saw
Alliance members he asked:

"Who and where'ssss the top-bot? -I'm ready to hunt,
desssstroy and kill.."




--- RYO D <striderzero1@...> wrote:
> I'm in the CF Docking bay can a Bat get in there?
> 
> ::Koj::
> Stands talking to Inu-Yasha feel the peck of the bat
> "Feh!" Takes the Lance 
> in one swift movement Impales the Bat was the
> Tetsusaiga before it can 
> gather enough enegry to get any Dna Data or base
> data. The tetsusaiga drinks 
> its life force till its Bone dry. As the the bite
> wound closes. "Inu-Yasha 
> you have a mission and Stop calling me Dragon Master
> Koj."
> 
> ::Inu-Yasha::
> "Accept what you are Dragon Master?"
> 
> ::Koj::
> Koj watchs the Bat go Offline for good. "I need you
> to go hide yourself and 
> watch Zardus & KitKat and any other great powers on
> the battle Field record 
> the battle and bring it back."
> 
> ::Inu-Yasha::
> Enters stealth mode and carries out Koj orders. "Yes
> my friend."
> 
> ::Koj::
> Looks at the bat Probe "whoever sent this I bet you
> can hear me now so  Play 
> what ever games you like with the lesser maximals
> but cross me again and 
> your suffering will legendary even in HELL!" As Koj
> grabs the bats data box 
> then lets loose a furry of slash cutting the bat
> into mere pieces. Gets on 
> the Intercom: Clean up in docking bay 2 Clean up in
> docking bay 2. Koj heads 
> towards Trinitys srceams "You ok Kid."
